wikipedia_page.main: Kenneth Meechan  (born 16 February 1972) was a Scottish footballer who played for Dumbarton and Stranraer.He is currently one of three U17s coaches at his hometown club Greenock Morton.

response: * The League match against Albion Rovers on 8 August marked Kenny Meechan's 100th appearance for Dumbarton in all national competitions - the 114th Dumbarton player to reach this milestone.
